attributes.action: Have a vote of no confidence in this government
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May has lost control of her party and can not get a commons majority for any brexit solution. Brexit has dominated the House of Commons and Theresa May has not got through enough domestic policies
attributes.background: Due to the governments handling of Brexit and lack of domestic policies I put forward this government has lost the confidence of the people

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
